ANCHOR_SMASH.name: Anchor Smash
ANCHOR_SMASH.description: Drop an anchor at mouse location

BENDY_BEAMS.name: Bendy Beams
BENDY_BEAMS.description: Fire a barrage of curving projectiles
BENDY_BEAMS.descriptionLong:
Charge: 8 Seconds
Beam Number: 10
Beam Damage: 14

CALL_OF_WALRUS.name: Call of Walrus
CALL_OF_WALRUS.description: Buffs damage and attack speed of nearby allies
CALL_OF_WALRUS.descriptionLong:
Charge: 12 Seconds
Buff Duration: 4 Seconds
Bonus Attack Speed: +15%
Bonus Damage: +30%

DEPTH_CHARGE.name: Depth Charge
DEPTH_CHARGE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 10 Seconds
Explosion Number: 4
Explosion Damage: 40

DODGE_ROLL.name: Dodge Roll
DODGE_ROLL.description: Perform an invulnerable dodge in the direction you are facing

FAFROTSKIES.name: Fafrotskies
FAFROTSKIES.description: Create a storm cloud that drops damaging rain
FAFROTSKIES.descriptionLong:
Charge: 15 Seconds
Cloud Duration: 7.5 Seconds
Rain Interval: 0.1 Second
Rain Damage: 11

FLASH_BANG.name: Flash Bang
FLASH_BANG.descriptionLong:
Charge: 9 Seconds
Base Damage: 30
Blind Duration: 4.0 Seconds

HEALING_FIELD.name: Healing Field
HEALING_FIELD.description: Creates a field that regenerates health
HEALING_FIELD.descriptionLong:
Charge: 100 Damage
Field Duration: 10 Seconds
Healing: 12 per Second

HYDRAULIC_UPPERCUT.name: Hydraulic Uppercut
HYDRAULIC_UPPERCUT.description: Perform an upwards attack. User is briefly invulnerable during the attack
HYDRAULIC_UPPERCUT.descriptionLong:
Charge: 8 Seconds
Uppercut Damage: 60
Invulnerability Duration: 0.9 Second

IMMOLATION_AURA.name: Immolation Aura
IMMOLATION_AURA.description: Ignites self, burning nearby enemies and charge towards mouse
IMMOLATION_AURA.descriptionLong:
Charge: 13 Seconds
Burn Damage: 300 per Second

JUMP_KICK.name: Jump Kick
JUMP_KICK.description: Perform a flying kick, Knock enemies into walls for additional damage scaling to victim's velocity

MARINE_SNOWGLOBE.name: Marine Snowglobe
MARINE_SNOWGLOBE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 10 Seconds
Snow Damage: 24
Slow Duration: 5 Seconds
Slow Amount: -75%

MELON.name: Melon
MELON.descriptionLong:
Charge: 125 Damage
Melon Healing: 32 over 8 Seconds

MERIDIAN_MAKER.name: Meridian Maker
MERIDIAN_MAKER.description: Fire a projectile that creates a temporary current in ints path
MERIDIAN_MAKER.descriptionLong:
Charge: 9 Seconds
Projectile Damage: 40
Current Duration: 6 Seconds

METEOR_STRIKE.name: Meteor Strike
METEOR_STRIKE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 20 Seconds
Meteor Duration: 3.5 Seconds
Meteor Interval: 0.1 Second
Meteor damage: 24

MISSILE_POD.name: Missile Pod
MISSILE_POD.description: Fire a barrage of homing missiles

NAUTICAL_MINE.name: Nautical Mine
NAUTICAL_MINE.description: Throws an large naval mine. Mine explodes after being shot a few times
NAUTICAL_MINE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 8 Seconds
Mine Damage: 75
Mine Lifespan: 12 Seconds

ORBITAL_SHIELD.name: Orbital Shield
ORBITAL_SHIELD.description: Create several projectiles that orbit the user
ORBITAL_SHIELD.descriptionLong:
Charge: 18 Seconds
Shield Duration: 5 Seconds
Orbitals: 3
Orbital Damage: 27

PLUS_MINUS.name: Plus Minus
PLUS_MINUS.description: Shock nearby enemies with chain lightning
PLUS_MINUS.descriptionLong:
Charge: 12 Seconds
Lightning Damage: 18
Lightning Chains: 8 Enemies

PORTABLE_SENTRY_FLAK.name: Portable Sentry: Flak
PORTABLE_SENTRY_FLAK.description: Drop a projectile to create an allied turret that fires a close-ranged burst of projectiles

PORTABLE_SENTRY_VOLLEY.name: Portable Sentry: Volley
PORTABLE_SENTRY_VOLLEY.description: Drop a projectile to create an allied turret that fires a long-ranged volley of projectiles

PROXIMITY_MINE.name: Proximity Mine
PROXIMITY_MINE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 12 Seconds
Prime Delay: 2 Seconds
Mine Damage: 80

RADIAL_BARRAGE.name: Radial Barrage
RADIAL_BARRAGE.description: Fire currently equipped weapon in all directions
RADIAL_BARRAGE.descriptionLong:
Charge: 20 Seconds (reduced for high clip size weapons)
Radial Shots: 6
Shot Interval 0.1 Second

RELOADER.name: Autoreloader
RELOADER.description: Buffs attack speed and makes weapons not consume clip temporarily
RELOADER.descriptionLong:
Charge: 13 Seconds

Buff Duration: 1.5 Seconds
Bonus Attack Speed: Scales with Clip Size

RESERVED_FUEL.name: Reserved Fuel
RESERVED_FUEL.descriptionLong:
Charge: 15 Seconds
Regenerates 90 Fuel over 5 Seconds

SAMSON_OPTION.name: Samson Option
SAMSON_OPTION.description: User dies and creates a series of explosions
SAMSON_OPTION.descriptionLong:
Charge: 5 Seconds
Explosion Duration: 1.5 Seconds
Explosion Interval: 0.12 Second
Explosion Damage: 75

SPRING_LOADER.name: Spring Loader
SPRING_LOADER.description: Create a temporary spring at mouse location

SUPPLY_DROP.name: Supply Drop
SUPPLY_DROP.descriptionLong:
Charge: 8 Seconds
Starts off Fully Charged

TAINTED_WATER.name: Tainted Water
TAINTED_WATER.description: Release a poisonous cloud in the direction you are facing
TAINTED_WATER.descriptionLong:
Charge: 10 Seconds
Poison Duration: 4.5 Seconds
Poison Damage: 60 per Second

TRACTOR_BEAM.name: Tractor Beam
TRACTOR_BEAM.description: Fire a projectile that grabs an enemy, Throw victim into walls or other enemies for additional damage
TRACTOR_BEAM.descriptionLong:
Charge: 8 Seconds
Grab Duration: 4 Seconds
Primary Impact Damage: 30
Secondary Impact Damage: 40
